select IFNULL(`od3`.`name`,'其他') AS `departmentName`, IFNULL(od3.id,0) as departmentId, sum(s.sms_number) as smsNumber, s.posttime as posttime from ht_sms_count s LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od` on s.department_id = od.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od2` ON `od2`.`id` = `od`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od3` ON `od3`.`id` = `od2`.`parentid` group by posttime,departmentName
AND posttime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{post_time_begin},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND posttime <= STR_TO_DATE(#{post_time_end},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND departmentId in
#{dep}
ORDER BY s.posttime desc
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
